Package me.dessie.dessielib.scoreboardapi

Class ScoreboardAPI

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.scoreboardapi.ScoreboardAPI
public class ScoreboardAPI extends Object
Main class for registering the ScoreboardAPI, and managing individual Scoreboards for players.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ScoreboardAPI(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String name)
    Each player should have their own unique ScoreboardAPI instance.

    • ScoreboardAPI

      public ScoreboardAPI(org.bukkit.entity.Player player, String name)
      Each player should have their own unique ScoreboardAPI instance.
      Parameters:
      player - The player to create this Scoreboard for
      name - The display name for the objective

    • addTablistTeam

      public ScoreboardAPI addTablistTeam(String teamName, @Nullable org.bukkit.ChatColor color, @Nullable String prefix, int weight)
      Creates an organized team that will be sorted by weight on the tablist. The lower the weight, the higher the team will be.
      Parameters:
      teamName - The name of the team
      color - The color of the tean
      prefix - The prefix that appears before a player's name
      weight - The weight of the team
      Returns:
      The ScoreboardAPI object

    • setPlayerTeam

      public ScoreboardAPI setPlayerTeam(String teamName)
      Parameters:
      teamName - The team to set the player on.
      Returns:
      The ScoreboardAPI object

    • setLine

      public ScoreboardAPI setLine(String text, int score)
      Sets a line of text on the Scoreboard
      Parameters:
      text - The text
      score - The index of the line
      Returns:
      The ScoreboardAPI object

      public boolean hasTeam(String team)
      Parameters:
      team - The team to request
      Returns:

      Cycles through each frame to simulate animation.
      Parameters:

      delay - Delay between each frame
      score - The index to execute this animation on

    • getBoards

      public static List<ScoreboardAPI> getBoards()
      Note: Modifying this list will NOT modify the board list.
      Returns:
      All currently registered Scoreboard API objects

    • register

      public static void register(org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin yourPlugin)
      Registration method, this must be called with your Plugin instance before creating ScoreboardAPI objects.
      Parameters:
      yourPlugin - Your plugin instance

    • getPlugin

      public static org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getPlugin()
      Returns the plugin instance that registered the API.

      public static boolean isRegistered()
      Returns if ScoreboardAPI has been registered.
